Key Match Events: Edwin Díaz allowed a grand slam by Corbin Carroll in the eighth inning, leading to a 8-5 loss
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets had a man on base and two outs in the eighth inning with their top reliever, Edwin Díaz, on the mound
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Carlos Mendoza expressed confidence in Díaz's ability to rebound despite the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets are four games back of the Braves in the NL Wild Card race with 29 games remaining
